ai-patthana13.4:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma they resplendently:
ai-patthana13.4:1.1_0: causes and conditions to be grasping on the teaching don’t give rise to those without grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:1.1_1: causes and conditions to be grasped in this way. The teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause of grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:1.1_2: causes and conditions for the sake of grasping, without grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:1.1_3: Sounded by the teaching don’t arise because of grasping the mental grasping, and for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:1.1_4: So long as you don’t give rise to the teachings, they’re not attached to grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:2.1_1: causes and conditions for the sake of not grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:2.1_2: Some things don’t arise because of not grasping the teaching don’t give rise to the cause of grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:3.1_0: Not grasping arises dependent on those things, and doesn’t give rise to those without grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:3.1_1: Not grasping arises dependent on those things, and doesn’t give rise to the cause of grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:3.1_2: Not grasping arises dependent on those things, and doesn’t give rise to the cause of grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:3.1_3: So they don’t give rise to the teachings, and don’t arise because of not grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:3.1_4: Some things don’t arise because of not grasping the principles for the sake of not grasping, and for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:4.1_0: Not grasping attraction, grasping, mental fixation, insisting on views, and underlying tendencies.
ai-patthana13.4:4.1_1: Not grasping attraction, grasping, mental fixations, insistence, and underlying tendencies.
ai-patthana13.4:4.1_2: Not grasping attraction and grasping, they don’t arise because of not grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:5.1_0: Whatever grasping does arise in you are not for the sake of grasping, and for the sake of grasping?
ai-patthana13.4:5.1_1: Whatever is for the sake of grasping, and for the sake of grasping?
ai-patthana13.4:5.1_2: So long as you don’t grasp at the teachings, or for the sake of grasping, nor for the sake of grasping, and for the sake of continued existence, you don’t arise because of grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:5.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.4:6.1_4: What is not the ignorant fools?
ai-patthana13.4:7.1_0: He should go to the same room as a regular monk. And he should associate with those without transmigrating.
ai-patthana13.4:8.1_0: the cause, attached to, not for the sake of the donor is a condition for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:8.1_1: Not grasping is the reason why the teaching doesn’t arise ...
ai-patthana13.4:9.1_0: the state of existence in the basic principles, etc., is a condition for the objection of the Dhamma, and for the object of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana13.4:9.1_1: the teaching doesn’t grasp at the feet, etc., or for the object of the principles, or for the object of the principles of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana13.4:9.1_2: The condition is not by way of grasping, etc., the Dhamma is a condition for the continuation of the teaching, and for the object.
ai-patthana13.4:9.1_3: the principles are not grasped, and the teachings don’t underlying tendencies. It is a condition for the continuation of the teaching, and for the support of those without grasping.
ai-patthana13.4:9.1_4: the teaching don’t grasp at the feet of the path, or for the object of the teachings, or for the object of the principles, and for the support of those things.
ai-patthana13.4:10.1_0: (They are) not attached to accusations, not for the sake of grasping, the Dhamma, and the support of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana13.4:10.1_1: the principle not grasping is a condition for the continuation of accusations. It is a condition for the continuation of the teaching.
ai-patthana13.4:10.1_2: (They are) not found in the Dhamma, nor are the condition for the continuations of the accused, etc.
ai-patthana13.4:10.1_3: the reinforced by not grasping, by making amends, and by not grasping aggregates the truth, and for the object of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana13.4:10.1_4: the reinforced by not grasping, nor by making amends for the ill-will, and by not grasping aggregates, and by the means of the underlying tendencies.
ai-patthana13.4:11.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.4:12.1_1: When there is a single lake with the sixteenth section, heroes and after the tranquillity of each other, the three were reborn in the Jeta Grove, ten and twenty-five hundred and eighteen faculties, the five powers, ten and the twenty-eight faculties,
ai-patthana13.4:12.1_3: You should get close to a question.
